name: Impetus
title: Microsoft MakeCode for 3D worlds
description: A Blocks / JavaScript code editor for 3D worlds powered by Microsoft MakeCode.

files.main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="0" y="0">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="Scene3d.Camera_blockCombine_set">
        <field name="property">Scene3d.camera</field>
        <value name="scene3d">
          <block type="world_scene"></block>
        </value>
        <value name="value">
          <block type="camera_perspective"></block>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="Object3d.Vector_blockCombine_set">
            <field name="property">Object3d.position</field>
            <value name="object3d">
              <block type="Scene3d.Camera_blockCombine_get">
                <field name="property">Scene3d.camera</field>
                <value name="scene3d">
                  <block type="world_scene"></block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="value">
              <block type="math_vector">
                <value name="x">
                  <shadow type="math_number">
                    <field name="NUM">0</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <value name="y">
                  <shadow type="math_number">
                    <field name="NUM">20</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <value name="z">
                  <shadow type="math_number">
                    <field name="NUM">20</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="object3d_look_at">
                <value name="object3d">
                  <block type="Scene3d.Camera_blockCombine_get">
                    <field name="property">Scene3d.camera</field>
                    <value name="scene3d">
                      <block type="world_scene"></block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="position">
                  <shadow type="math_vector"></shadow>
                  <block type="math_zero_vector"></block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="add_object">
                    <value name="scene">
                      <shadow type="world_scene"></shadow>
                    </value>
                    <value name="object3d">
                      <block type="light_directional">
                        <value name="color">
                          <shadow type="color_picker">
                            <field name="color">0xffffff</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                        <value name="intensity">
                          <shadow type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">1</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="position">
                      <shadow type="math_zero_vector"></shadow>
                      <block type="math_vector">
                        <value name="x">
                          <shadow type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">5</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                        <value name="y">
                          <shadow type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">20</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                        <value name="z">
                          <shadow type="math_number">
                            <field name="NUM">0</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
